GDPR banner

step1:


    <body data-plugins="gdpr">

step2:

模板：


    <div id="cookies-eu-banner" class="bg-light text-center tiny py-1" style="display: none;">
      This site uses cookies. By continuing to use this site you agree to our use of cookies in accordance with our
      <a href="/cookies-privacy.html" target="_blank" id="cookies-eu-more">Cookie Policy</a>
      <button id="cookies-eu-reject" class="btn btn-sm btn-link py-0">Reject</button>
      <button id="cookies-eu-accept" class="btn btn-sm btn-link py-0">Accept</button>
    </div>

Swiper

Slide 1
Slide 2
Slide 3

step1:


      <body data-plugins="swiper">

step2:


      window.addEventListener('swiperLoad', function(){
        var swiper = new Swiper(...);
      })

step3:

Swiper官方文档

Seasonal Banner

step1:


    <body data-plugins="seasonalBanner">

step2:

模板：


    <div data-toggle="seasonal-banner" data-target="目标地址" data-banner="图片地址" data-mobile-banner="移动端图片地址" data-always-show="false" data-cookie-mark="tt"></div>

Disqus

step1:


    <body data-plugins="disqus">

step2:

模板：


    <div data-toggle="disqus" data-disqus-host="xxx.disqus.com"></div>

Popup Form

step1:


    <body data-plugins="popupform,sweetalert2">

step2:

模板：


    <div data-popupform-template="popupform1">
      <title>Form Title</title>
      <input type="text" name="..." placeholder="..." label="..." required>
      <input type="email" name="..." placeholder="..." label="..." required>
      ...
    </div>

step3:

使用：


    <a href="javascript:;" data-togglet="popupForm" data-target="popupform1">Click me!</div>

效果：

Click me!
